name: Fly Fishing 3D
description:
Among sport fishing enthusiasts...
"Fly Fishing" holds unmatched popularity...
And now we introduce a full 3D game!

Let's begin the psychological battle with fishes in beautiful nature!

Main Features:

The river flow speed and direction is very realistic.
The view is just like a fly flows around the real mountain stream.

11 types of flies have their own special features.
Depending on your choices of field and seasons,
you can enjoy the feeling of experiencing real-life fly fishing!

We prepared three types of mountain streams (upper, middle, lower), lake, and river.
And two types of fishing: "Bank Fishing" and "Boat Fishing"!

"Shop" and "coins" are newly added!
Collect coins by catching fishes or win some tournaments!
Buy some new items to make easier to catch!

There are four types of game modes!

10 Online tournaments are newly added!
You can compete with other anglers around the world!
Win tournaments and earn trophies and rewards!

6 round tournaments are newly added too!
You can compete with ten NPC competitors in total amount, weight, and length of fish(es)!
Let's win all rounds and aim the "Fly Fishing Champion"!

We've increased the Challenge mode levels into 24 levels!
Complete all levels in decided time limits, fields, and flies!

You can enjoy fishing free in "Free fishing mode"!
You can go to the new fields by catching lots of fishes.
In each fishing fields, catchable fishes are displayed in silhouette!
Let's try to remove all silhouette, by catching all fishes!
